title: The Big Bang Theory Quiz App
creator: AppDeli

extendedInfo.description: How much of a fan of The Big Bang Theory are you? This Quiz is free and will test your knowledge of the Show. This Quiz has the following: ** Beautiful retina quality graphics ** Questions of all the series** Random gameplay no repeating questions in each run ** No need to type anything in questions are all multi choice buttons making easy fun gameplay ** Questions come at random so won't be seeing the same questions every time you play ** HeyZap to compete against your friends This trivia app is unofficial and not affiliated with The Big Bang Theory in any way.
